page.title: 16Swimming At Parkend School
page.content:
On Wednesdays we go swimming and I think it is fun.We go on a bus to Cinderford to Heyward Comprehensive School.We have three different groups of children - learners, where the infants get used to the water; the middle group who can all swim a little bit and who are trying to improve and the top group who can all swim at least 25 metres and are learning to dive and how to different strokes.In the summer we also have a Swimming Gala where different Forest Of Dean Primary Schools join together.It doesn't matter if we win or lose because it is only for fun.
Donna Vaughan
Aged 11 Years.
